entry.title: RT Balaji Srinivasan: How do you distinguish a fly-by-night DAO from one that is motivated by something more than money? Real communities are dense su...
entry.summary: RTâ€‚Balaji Srinivasan How do you distinguish a fly-by-night DAO from one that is motivated by something more than money? Real communities are dense subgraphs. Verifiable, unique humans within the community should be much more likely to follow other community members than random accounts.
